mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON VALUES ((SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('X', 8) STR FROM DUAL), (SELECT user_id FROM USERS WHERE user_id = #{teacherId}), #{lessonName}, #{lessonDay}, #{lessonStartTime},#{lessonEndTime}, #{lessonPlace}, #{fees}, #{subject}, #{lessonContent:VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select L.* from lesson L where L.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and L.lesson_day like '%${lessonDay}%' order by L.lesson_start_time
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (select L.* FROM lesson L where L.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and L.lesson_day like '%${lessonDay}%' ) countTable

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT L.*, B.student_id, B.student_name, B.user_name, B.proposal FROM LESSON L, (SELECT SR.lesson_code SRL, SR.student_id student_id, SR.student_name student_name, A.UU user_name,SR.proposal proposal FROM students_record SR, (SELECT student_id SI, U.user_name UU FROM users U, relation R WHERE U.user_id = R.parent_id AND U.user_id = #{searchId}) A WHERE SR.student_id = A.SI) B WHERE L.lesson_code = B.SRL )countTable
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO BOOK VALUES(#{isbn},#{bookTitle},#{publisher:VARCHAR},#{bookPrice:VARCHAR},#{author:VARCHAR},#{bookYear:VARCHAR},#{bookImg:VARCHAR}) INTO LESSON_BOOK VALUES(SEQ_LESSON_BOOK_BOOK_CODE.nextVal, (SELECT lesson_code FROM LESSON WHERE lesson_code = #{lessonCode}),#{isbn}) SELECT*FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO LESSON_BOOK VALUES (SEQ_LESSON_BOOK_BOOK_CODE.nextVal, (SELECT lesson_code from lesson where lesson_code = #{lessonCode}), (SELECT ISBN FROM book where isbn = #{isbn}))
INSERT INTO LESSON_BOOK VALUES (SEQ_LESSON_BOOK_BOOK_CODE.nextVal,(SELECT lesson_vode FROM LESSON WHERE lesson_code = #{lessonCode}),#{isbn})
mapper.select: SELECT B.isbn, B.book_Img, B.book_title, B.author, B.publisher, B.book_year, B.book_price, A.lesson_name FROM LESSON_BOOK LB, BOOK B ,(SELECT L.lesson_code LC, L.lesson_name lesson_name FROM LESSON L, STUDENTS_RECORD SR, USERS U WHERE L.lesson_code = SR.lesson_code and L.teacher_id = U.user_id and SR.student_id = #{searchId}) A WHERE A.LC = LB.lesson_code AND LB.isbn = B.isbn

SELECT B.*, C.lesson_name FROM LESSON_BOOK LB, BOOK B, (SELECT L.lesson_code LL, L.LESSON_NAME lesson_name, B.SRN student_name FROM LESSON L, (SELECT SR.lesson_code SRL, SR.student_id SRI, SR.student_name SRN FROM students_record SR, (SELECT student_id SI FROM users U, relation R WHERE U.user_id = R.parent_id AND U.user_id = #{searchId}) A WHERE SR.student_id = A.SI) B WHERE L.lesson_code = B.SRL) C WHERE LB.LESSON_CODE = C.LL AND B.ISBN = LB.ISBN

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT B.*, C.lesson_name FROM LESSON_BOOK LB, BOOK B, (SELECT L.lesson_code LL, L.LESSON_NAME lesson_name, B.SRN BS FROM LESSON L, (SELECT SR.lesson_code SRL, SR.student_id SRI, SR.student_name SRN FROM students_record SR, (SELECT student_id SI FROM users U, relation R WHERE U.user_id = R.parent_id AND U.user_id = #{searchKeyword}) A WHERE SR.student_id = A.SI) B WHERE L.lesson_code = B.SRL) C WHERE LB.LESSON_CODE = C.LL AND B.ISBN = LB.ISBN )countTable
